courses.title: Angular Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of building applications with Angular, including components, template syntax, routing, services, forms, HTTP communication, modules, and testing.

courses.title: Angular Architecture and Best Practices
courses.description: Learn architectural concepts, best practices, and how to solve challenging tasks in Angular. Discover component communication techniques, state management, code organization, and general best practices for building maintainable and scalable Angular applications.

courses.title: ChatGPT and Generative AI: The Big Picture
courses.description: Get a foundational understanding of generative AI and how it works to create human-like responses. Explore ChatGPT capabilities and learn how generative AI can transform how you work, learn, and interact.

courses.title: Angular Best Practices
courses.description: Learn key best practices in Angular for building larger, more complex applications. Explore project and folder organization, module organization using Core, shared, and feature modules to avoid maintenance, organizational, and scalability issues.

courses.title: Node.js, Express, MongoDB & More: The Complete Bootcamp
courses.description: Master Node.js by building a real-world RESTful API and web app. Learn authentication, Node.js security, payment integration, and more in this comprehensive bootcamp covering Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and modern backend development.

courses.title: The Complete JavaScript Course: From Zero to Expert!
courses.description: Master JavaScript with projects, challenges and theory. A comprehensive modern JavaScript course covering everything from fundamentals to advanced concepts, with hands-on projects and practical challenges.

courses.title: Angular - The Complete Guide (2025 Edition)
courses.description: Master Angular (formerly Angular 2) and build awesome, reactive web apps. A comprehensive guide covering all aspects of Angular development from fundamentals to advanced concepts for building modern web applications.
